org.jcvi.jillion.testutils.assembly.cas

Class CasParserTestDouble.AlignmentBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.testutils.assembly.cas.CasParserTestDouble.AlignmentBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    CasParserTestDouble

    public static final class CasParserTestDouble.AlignmentBuilder
extends Object
    Class that builds an alignment for a single read to a reference.
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Method Detail

      • addAlignmentRegion

        public CasParserTestDouble.AlignmentBuilder addAlignmentRegion(CasAlignmentRegionType type,
                                                               int length)
        Add a new CasAlignmentRegion of the specified length. The read's ungapped sequence of the will default to either the reference sequence if the type is a CasAlignmentRegionType.MATCH_MISMATCH or Ns for CasAlignmentRegionType.INSERTs.
        Parameters:
        type - the alignment type; can not be null.
        length - the length; must be >= 1.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if type is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if length < 1

      • addAlignmentRegion

        public CasParserTestDouble.AlignmentBuilder addAlignmentRegion(CasAlignmentRegionType type,
                                                               String sequence)
        Add a new CasAlignmentRegion of the specified sequence. The sequence provided is in the ALIGNED orientation. So a reverse read will have the final full sequence reverse complemented when it is written out to the read file. The decision to use the aligned orientation is to make tests more clear by having the reverse reads easily understandable from an alignment context without having to mentally reverse complement when reading code.
        Parameters:
        type - the alignment type; can not be null.
        length - the length; must be >= 1.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if type is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if length < 1

      • build

        public CasParserTestDouble.Builder build()
        This read's alignment is complete.
        Returns:
        the parent CasParserTestDouble.Builder instance that created this object.
